Question: ZITEC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ZITEC CES 2024

- 10-inch touchscreen display
- Quad-core processor
- 8GB RAM and 128GB storage
- Front and rear cameras
- Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity
- Android 10 operating system
- Rugged and durable design
Summary_cn:
ZITEC CES 2024

- 10英寸触摸屏显示
- 四核处理器
- 8GB RAM和128GB存储
- 前后摄像头
- Wi-Fi和蓝牙连接
- Android 10操作系统
- 强固耐用的设计
